Celzi di Forino on his knees, these people cannot be abandoned
Too often the question of the "structural problem" has turned into an alibi for not intervening
06 Nov 2019, 08:46 by Vinicio Marchetti



Celzi di Forino is on his knees, bad weather has caused damage to roads, homes and commercial and craft activities. A terrible custom that, by now, is repeated every year.
The mayor Antonio Olivieri thundered:
"Securing the territory is no longer a question that can be postponed".
The alibi of the "Structural Problem"
Meanwhile, however, the situation remains dramatic with a well-known problem: money is lacking to solve the problem structurally; just as there is no money for routine maintenance. And the people, meanwhile, because of the floods, remain stuck in the house.
What are we waiting for? The classic dramatic tragedy that moves consciences? Another sad custom ... this time all Italian.
